Let's make dataset from tip dataset.
Unite columns:
"user_id" "text" "business_id"      "likes" "date" 
(all without "type")    


```{r}
load("C:/Downloads/LearningR/CapstoneProjectR/tip.RData")
myvar<-c("user_id", "text", "business_id","likes", "date")
tip_id<-tip[myvar]
head(tip_id, n=1)
```



Save our short dataset

```{r}
save (tip_id,file="C:/Downloads/LearningR/CapstoneProjectR/tip_id.RData")

```
